languages.text: "Каллигос был из тех, для кого погибнуть в бою было величайшим желанием всей жизни. Что ж, его чаяние сбылось".
"Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."
languages.original_text: "Каллигос был из тех, для кого погибнуть в бою было величайшим желанием всей жизни. Что ж, его чаяние сбылось".

traits.locale_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

languages.text: “卡利戈斯就是那种把战死疆场作为最大梦想的人。很好，他的梦想实现了。”
languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

traits.locale_text: “卡利戈斯就是那种把战死疆场作为最大梦想的人。很好，他的梦想实现了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Calligos était le genre d'homme dont le vœu le plus cher est de mourir au combat. Il a été exaucé. »
languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

traits.locale_text: « Calligos était le genre d'homme dont le vœu le plus cher est de mourir au combat. Il a été exaucé. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Calligos era la clase de hombre cuyo mayor deseo era morir en combate. Bueno, pues se ha cumplido».
languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

traits.locale_text: «Calligos era la clase de hombre cuyo mayor deseo era morir en combate. Bueno, pues se ha cumplido».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「カリゴスは戦闘で死ぬことを人生至上の願いとしていた男だ。夢を叶えたと言っていい」
languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴスは戦闘で死ぬことを人生至上の願いとしていた男だ。夢を叶えたと言っていい」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Calligos war die Sorte Mann, deren größter Wunsch es war, im Kampf zu sterben. Nun, sein Traum hat sich erfüllt."
languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos war die Sorte Mann, deren größter Wunsch es war, im Kampf zu sterben. Nun, sein Traum hat sich erfüllt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

languages.text: "Calligos, tek arzusu savaşta ölmek tek arzusu olanlardandı. Arzusunu gerçekleştirmiş oldu."
languages.original_text: "Calligos was the kind of man for whom dying in battle was his greatest wish in life. Well, his dream came true."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos, savaşta ölmek tek arzusu olan tiplerdendi. Arzusunu gerçekleştirdi işte."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
